alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 2:57PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. Johns and southeastern Duval Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 257 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Durbin, or 7 miles east of Fruit Cove. This storm was drifting south. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fruit Cove, World Golf Village, Durbin, Nocatee and Bayard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval
